short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View wiktionary in frame! Note: pdfs are not supported.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Opens up a mini Wiktionary frame inside your tab. This feature is accessible through the right-click context menu. 

This is quite useful when reading text in a foreign language.

Note: due to a limitation in chrome's extension system, pdfs are currently unsupported :(

This project is open source! Review the source code at https://github.com/myrriad/inlinewiktionary
